trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around April 20th 1999
Summary: saw it, vanished, communicated and reappeared different place several different times
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving south 0n 91 freeway, crystal clear day, caught sight of something odd hovering in far distance around Anaheim Hills,slowed down to observe it,and watched it dissappear. It seemed to say "I'm here and I looked way left, a there it was again! I tried to watch and pull off the freeway, and it vanished again, yet toying with me,now I'm over here. Caught it again but while getting ready to pull off to see it better, I lost it. It looked like a metalic tea strainer hanging in the sky then taking off at such a speed I could'nt follow it. Light reflecting off upper part, and black onlower part. Fascinated,and a little scared,trying to make sense of it.Thought it was a helicopter, but it was'nt.Felt it was a ufo, and telepathically wanting me to know it.
